text: "Chim Chim Cher-ee" is a song from Mary Poppins, the 1964 musical movie. It was sung by Dick Van Dyke and Julie Andrews. It won the 1964 Academy Award for the Best Original Song. The song was inspired by one of the drawings of a chimney sweep. It was covered and redone through other musicians. Category:1964 songs Category:Best Original Song Academy Award-winning songs Category:Burl Ives songs Category:Bing Crosby songs Category:Louis Armstrong songs
title: Chim Chim Cher-ee
